name: Minutaur
tag_list: time, social-network, moments, gift, gifts, moments-in-time, registry
overview:
Minutaur an online community based on time. Minutaur is part social network, part community bulletin-board, but designed as a way to celebrate and promote individuality through unique moments in time.

Members of Minutaur select a specific moment in time âˆ’ such as a special time of a special day, the precise moment of their birth, the birth of a loved one, a wedding, or even just a favorite time of day. That specific moment then becomes uniquely linked to the member, who can:

Share an attached message, image, or video Send e-mails to friends announcing their moment Check out other membersâ€™ moments Leave comments on member profiles Purchase certificates, t-shirts, mugs, and other time-related gear

Advertisers also have the opportunity to sponsor Big Time (single days, specific dates, days of the week, months, seasons, or the entire year).
